video.title: Pablo Escobar, el patrón del mal
video.synopsis: From his days as a petty thief to becoming head of a drug-trafficking empire, this riveting series charts the life of the infamous Pablo Escobar.

episodes.synopsis: Even as a child, Pablo had a head for business. When he grows up, he begins working with El Alguacil and is introduced to the drug trade.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After his incarceration for theft, Pablo decides to enter the cocaine business by purchasing a farm to ensure drug production.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and Gonzalo are incarcerated for drug trafficking, while Fabio is forced to accept his sister Patricia’s relationship with Pablo.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Using the planes he purchased, Pablo ships drugs to Miami, where Graciela handles distribution. Pablo gives his brother an unforgettable gift.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Pablo builds Hacienda Nápoles. The news of an extradition treaty between Colombia and the United States puts him on high alert.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The search for Irma proves fruitless, and the leaders of the organization meet to discuss the extradition treaty.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Pablo witnesses firsthand the influence politicians can wield, and he ponders going into politics as a means to seize power.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Some of Pablo's partners object to his political ambitions. He begins his campaign for Congress, but the party's leader doesn't want any ties to him.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Both Pablo and Galán see victories in the election, but Pablo is already plotting to get rid of his adversary.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Pablo takes office. Rodrigo Lara is appointed secretary of justice and uses the opportunity to make a statement against drug trafficking.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The newspaper publishes evidence linking Pablo to drug dealing. Meanwhile, Rodrigo is accused of having ties to the Mafia.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Pablo resigns from his seat in Congress and orders Rodrigo's assassination. The National Police take down a huge cocaine laboratory in the jungle.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo is murdered on Pablo's orders. Hunted by the police, Pablo is forced to go into hiding.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Col. Jiménez learns who was behind Rodrigo's assassination and searches for them all over Medellín. Pablo's mother, wife and son flee Colombia.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and his associates hide in Panama while the police search for them in the wake of Rodrigo's death.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Pablo bullies and bribes several agents of the police to obtain their protection. A pilot who works for the cartel gives the DEA compromising photos.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The guerrilla group takes over the Palace of Justice, leaving civilians, police officers and some of their own members dead.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Judges are assassinated and threatened for their attempts to bring Pablo to justice. Marcos Hérber escapes the police.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Judge Zuluaga is assassinated. Pablo smuggles cocaine on commercial flights. The U.S. activates the extradition process for members of the cartel.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Marino discovers the colonel's informant. The Supreme Court rejects the expulsion law. Pablo learns that his mistress, Yesenia, is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The cartel dealers publish a statement. Meanwhile, Pablo orders Yesenia to get an abortion.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Jorge assassinates the reporter investigating Crisanto, while Chili and Topo await the right time to attack the colonel.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: The colonel's death is met with celebration back at the hacienda. Jorge is in serious danger and fears for his life.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Jorge is murdered by Marcos. Maj. Aristides arrives at the farm with a search warrant, much to Pablo's chagrin.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Pablo gives the order to kill Guillermo and worries about the situation with Chili and Marcos.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: The Medellín cartel assassinates the editor of El Espectador, and Marcos celebrates the news.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: The media and the nation are devastated by the cartel's latest hit. Once again, the Supreme Court rejects the extradition treaty.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Pablo changes his mind and decides he wants to turn Marcos in to the police. Meanwhile, his men threaten Crisanto.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Betrayed by Pablo, Marcos becomes the first drug trafficker to be extradited to the United States.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's men free Cain and Kiko from jail using a helicopter. Pablo must leave his house to evade capture by Col. Pedregal.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Pablo kills Correa and Hernan, the men who clashed with Gildardo. But Mauricio, one of the partners, is looking for his friend.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Pablo decides to kill Mauricio to be done with Hernan, while the Medellín cartel declares war on the Cali cartel.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: While the Cali cartel prepares to strike, Pablo learns about the relationship between Marino and Yesenia.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: The cartel worries about the possibility of Pedro being extradited to the United States. Marino plans to escape with Yesenia.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: The Cali cartel goes after Pablo, but he evades them. The secretary of justice finally gets the orders against the Motoa brothers and Pablo.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's family suffers the consequences of the Cali cartel's attack. Pablo's men kill Col. Pedregal and make an attempt on Maj. Aristides's life.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Pablo kidnaps Andrés Pastrana, a candidate from a powerful political family. Patricia and Enelia worry about their living situation.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: The police free Andrés Pastrana, but the country's attorney general is kidnapped to keep pressure on the government to not accept extradition.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: A law to ban extradition goes before Congress and is supported by Sen. Santorini, an ally of Pablo.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: After Congress rejects the proposed law to forbid extradition, Pablo decides to take revenge by having his political enemies executed.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and the Mariachi plan to murder Galán. Magistrate Garcés Bernal is assassinated under Pablo's orders.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Col. Quintana decides to stop using his bodyguards and walk among the people to distract the enemy. Pablo and his men plot to assassinate Galán.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: A concerned neighbor's call to the police thwarts the cartel's attempt on Galán's life. But Chili manages to pull off the assassination.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Pablo tells Gonzalo that he tried to negotiate with the government but he didn't get anything, so now he plans to kill its leaders.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: After the death of Galán in the attack ordered by Pablo, the country is in shock. The president decides to create an elite group to fight terrorism.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: While the nation mourns Galán’s death, Juan Manuel and Gloria ask César Gaviria to continue Galán’s legacy by becoming the next president.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: El Espectador is targeted in a brutal attack. Medellín's cartel meets to discuss the subject of extradition and decides to go on the offensive.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: The elite group follows Maria to Pablo's location, and a confrontation results in Fabio's death. Pablo reacts by trying to execute the colonel.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's family misses his birthday celebration when they're detained at a military checkpoint. Furious, Pablo plants a bomb in the DAS building.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Pablo manages to meet with his family after a long time without seeing them.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: The Cali cartel receives news about El Mariachi, thanks to a spy in his ranks. An explosion destroys the intelligence building.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: With help from Naufrago, the Cali cartel can zero in on El Mexicano. Pablo is with a virgin.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: An enraged Pablo sends his men a list of 17 people who must suffer consequences for their actions.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and the organization try to negotiate an agreement with the government.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Pablo orders Evencio's murder. When the president suspends negotiations, Pablo unleashes a new war.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's reward for every dead police officer generates a wave of terror. Presidential candidate Bernardo Jaramillo meets his fate.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Pablo puts a $100,000 bounty on Col. Pabón's head and tells Gen. Pedraza that the paramilitaries plan to kill presidential candidate Diego Pizano.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Col. Pabón learns who Chili's informant is and plans to use him as bait. The government offers a $1 million reward for Pablo's capture.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Col. Pabón's men find Chili. A leader of the paramilitaries tells the police Pablo's location.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and his men are relentlessly targeted by the elite group, forcing them to flee to the jungle, where Pablo contracts malaria.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Pablo continues his war against the government, planting several bombs in Bogotá. César Gaviria takes office as the new president of Colombia.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Pablo reflects on the good times he shared with his cousin Gonzalo. The father of the Motoa brothers urges them to leave the business and surrender.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: The Motoa brothers try to negotiate a deal with the government, but the president doesn't agree to the terms. Pablo kidnaps several public figures.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Pablo kidnaps two more people. The government agrees to new terms, and Pablo frees three journalists as a sign that he is willing to negotiate.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: An informant leads the government to some of the hostages, but Diana Turbay is caught in the crossfire. Pablo gives the order to execute a hostage.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Diana Turbay dies after a failed rescue attempt, and the country is shattered by the loss. Pablo's men hunt for the police informant.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Pablo agrees to surrender if the president meets several of his conditions, including sending Pablo to a prison in Medellín. Maruja Pachón is freed.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Fernán Santana is freed. After Pablo negotiates the terms of his surrender, he's detained in La Catedral, a prison.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: The Gonzales brothers look for alliances to make an attempt against Pablo. Topo takes some money that belongs to Ramada.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Pablo orders the assassination of Ramada and Arellano. The government learns about Pablo's activities inside the prison and sends in the elite group.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Pablo’s enemies form a new organization called Los Pepes that helps the police to capture El Buitre and eliminate Cain.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Pablo’s family tries to flee the country. Thanks to Los Pepes, the police manage to locate Topo. Candonga surrenders to the police.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: In jail, Peluche receives a letter bomb that leaves him injured. Pablo says he will cooperate if his family is given protection in another country.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's family is turned away from Germany and returned to Colombia. A search squadron traces a phone call that Pablo makes to his family.
episodes.title: Episode 74
